Original:
再訪 Roxy，有種台灣第一批獨立樂團都老了，這間店卻從來沒有衰老的感動。

Roxy 99 和 Rocker 是我充滿青春回憶的地方，很欣慰這第 36 間據點的裝潢和音樂風格都跟那個記憶中的一模一樣——那個在解嚴前獨領風騷、挺過師大夜市抗爭、經歷過幫派圍事的腥風血雨的老 Roxy，竟然還默默存在著，誰敢相信？

現在還可以聽到西洋老搖滾、Disco、Metal 的公共空間真的都不多了，現在的 Roxy 雖然是年輕的大學生居多，這邊的音樂品味還是夠老、夠硬、夠有力！店內的音場也很漂亮，音量如果能再大聲點就完美了。

這陣子回訪發現夜間幾乎天天客滿，很難等到座位，只好懇請那些會拿「遊牧」一詞進行文化挪用的社會菁英高抬貴手，還有很多真正很爵士的「不限時咖啡廳」可以成為辦公淨土，就別被 Roxy “Rock House” 這塊次文化的穢土污染了吧。

我們這些樂迷要的不多，就是一個可以邊大口飲酒邊讓聽覺衝浪的小據點罷了。
EN:
Visit Roxy again. There is a kind of independent orchestra in Taiwan who are old, but this shop has never been moved by aging.

Roxy 99 and Rocker are where I am full of youthful memories. I am very pleased that the decoration and music style of this 36th stronghold is exactly the same as the memory -the one who led the leader before the strictness, survived the Night Market's fighting, and experienced it. The bloody old Roxy of the gang surrounded by the gang still existed silently. Who dares to believe it?

Now you can also hear the public space of Western Rock, Disco, and Metal. There are really not many public spaces. Although ROXY is mostly young college students now, the music taste here is still old, hard and powerful!The sound field in the store is also very beautiful, and if the volume can be louder, it will be perfect.

This time, I found that it was almost full at night, and it was difficult to wait for the seats. I had to ask those social elites that would take the word "nomadic" to carry out the expensive hands. Pure land, don't be polluted by Roxy "Rock House".

We don't want many fans, that is, a small base that can drink and make hearing surfing while drinking.

Original:
白天 — 溫馨舒適的音樂餐廳，一首接一首的懷舊歌曲，勾起你我青春的回憶。
夜晚 — 一間充滿節奏情感、可以淺酌放鬆、釋放壓抑靈魂的溫馨酒吧。
夜晚一定要來享受ROXY的氛圍啊！

* 星期五、六晚上有DJ，人流較多。
* 店內有很多黑膠唱片，在享用餐點調酒的同時，可以選一片想聽的黑膠給DJ，享受專屬你的經典歌曲。
* 座位區有插座、Wi-Fi。
* 板腱牛排早午餐 Sliced Blade Steak — 餐點ok。
* 不限時數，不收服務費，服務親切。

During the day -warm and comfortable music restaurant, one -time nostalgic songs, evoke your youthful memories.
At night -a warm bar full of rhythm emotions, relaxing, and release of depression of the soul.
Be sure to enjoy the Roxy atmosphere at night!

* There are DJs on Friday and Saturday, and there are many people.
* There are many vinyl records in the store. While enjoying meals, you can choose a piece of vinyl to be listened to DJ and enjoy your classic songs.
* The seat area has sockets and Wi-Fi.

Original:
週六上午來用餐，是最早進來的三四桌客人。從點餐到上飲料間隔20分鐘、從點菜到上餐間隔80分鐘，服務生一問三不知，五個人的訂位只送來三副餐具。每桌客人的餐點都嚴重延遲。
餐點無功無過，靠窗戶的位子冷氣非常微弱。
結帳的時候發現店員多點一杯根本沒上過的綠茶，並且在未說明清楚早午餐+53元是附中杯飲料的情況下，擅自幫我們點了大杯飲料，並算了單點的金額。經過溝通後金額有退回，好險有再確認金額。
結帳的時候是刷卡結帳，有開發票，而退款是直接退現金，並未修改發票金額。
live的聲音非常大，一群朋友聚餐的目的是聊天的話，這個場合不適合。live開始後我們講話都用吼的。
供大家參考。
—
針對店家的回覆：
戴頭巾的服務生顯然無法獨立作業，有一段時間她「一個人」要負責整個外場的點餐、上菜、set桌、進貨、作飲料、結帳，而上餐部分速度之慢，我想內場也有出現類似的問題。
分工的不合理與對員工能力的判斷失誤，與您提及的「墨菲定律」比較起來，店長/主管的問題可能更大，就客人的角度來看只能說自己的招牌是自己砸的。
是人就難免有機會失誤，我們這桌客人也是在理解大家出來工作都很辛苦的情況下，才選擇等你們的餐慢慢上、不惡言相向。但建議下次若有此情形發生，5%服務費就不要收了，服務費是建立在有品質的服務上的。
EN:
Come to dine on Saturday morning, the earliest three or four tables for coming in.From ordering to the drinking interval of 20 minutes, from ordering to the meal interval for 80 minutes, the waiter asked three or three, and the order of five people only sent three pairs of tableware.The meals of each table for each table are severely delayed.
There is no meal, and the air conditioning of the position of the window is very weak.
During the checkout, I found that the clerk had a more green tea that had not been put on at all, and when the breakfast+53 yuan was the attached middle cup drink, it helped us to order a large cup of drink and calculated the amount of the single order. EssenceAfter the communication, the amount is returned, and the amount of good danger is confirmed.
When checking out, it was swiped to check out, there was an invoice, and the refund was to directly withdraw the cash without modifying the amount of the invoice.
Live's voice is very loud. If a group of friends dinner is to chat, this occasion is not suitable.After Live began, we kept talking.
For your reference.
————
Reply to the store:
The waiter wearing a headscarf is obviously unable to operate independently. For a while, she was responsible for ordering, serving, SET tables, purchases, drinking, checkout, and the speed of the meal was slow. There are similar problems in the internal field.
The unreasonable division of labor and the judgment of employees' ability to make employees, compared with the "Murphy Law" you mentioned, the problem of the store manager/supervisor may be greater. From the perspective of guests of.
It is inevitable that people will inevitably have a chance to make mistakes. We also choose to wait for your meals to go up slowly and not badly.However, it is recommended that the next situation occur if this situation occurs, and the service fee will not be charged. The service fee is based on quality services.
